shared.saveNewChangesQuestion: Are you sure you would like to save your changes?

fieldPlaceholders.agreePolicy: By Submitting this form I agree to the ON LOCATION <0>Purchase Policy</0>, <1>Privacy Policy</1>, and <2>Terms of Use</2> of ON LOCATION
fieldPlaceholders.moreInformation: I would like to receive more information about ON LOCATION and its packages, and confirm my request to be contacted by email or phone for marketing and promotional purposes. I understand that I may opt out of receiving future communications from ON LOCATION following the initial communication.

fieldValidationMessages.primaryPhoneRequired: Please enter the primary phone number
fieldValidationMessages.mobilePhoneRequired: Please enter the mobile phone number
fieldValidationMessages.minLength: The min length should be 8 symbols.
fieldValidationMessages.maxLength: The max length should be 64 symbols.
fieldValidationMessages.shouldContainOneDigit: Should contain at least one digit.
fieldValidationMessages.shouldContainOneLowercase: Should contain at least one lowercase letter.
fieldValidationMessages.shouldContainOneUppercase: Should contain at least one uppercase letter.
fieldValidationMessages.shouldContainOneSpecial: Should contain at least one special character.
fieldValidationMessages.zipCodeLength: The zip code should contain 5 digits.
fieldValidationMessages.zipCodeOnlyDigits: The zip code should contain only digits.
fieldValidationMessages.emptyField: The field should not be empty
fieldValidationMessages.whitespace: No empty spaces at the start or at the end of value
fieldValidationMessages.invalidCharacters: The field contains some invalid characters
fieldValidationMessages.roomsCountLimit: This package has a room limit per reservation equal to {{roomsCount}}

formPlaceholders.agreePolicy: By creating an account, I agree to the On Location <0>Purchase Policy</0>, <1>Terms of Use</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2>
formPlaceholders.subscribeNewsletter: I would like to receive more information about Olympic Games Official Hospitality, On Location and its offerings, and confirm my request to be contacted by email or phone for marketing and promotional purposes in accordance with On Location's <0>Privacy Policy</0>. I understand that I may opt out of receiving future communication from On Location following the initial communication.
formPlaceholders.isMarketableToP24: I agree that On Location may communicate my data to the Paris 2024 Organizing Committee for the Olympic and Paralympic Games (<0>Paris 2024</0>) and the international Olympic Committee (<1>IOC</1>) who may use it for marketing purposes (including sending marketing communications) in accordance with their respective privacy policies.

fieldLabels.agreeGetUpdatesLabel: I would like to receive more information about ON LOCATION and its packages, and confirm my request to be contacted by email or phone for marketing and promotional purposes. I understand that I may opt out of receiving future communication from ON LOCATION following the initial communication.
